banks.name: Crypt
banks.description: The hero can battle various necropolis creatures and be rewarded with gold and artifacts. Revisiting Crypt will reduce morale by 1

banks.name: Cyclops stockpile
banks.description: The hero can fight cyclopes and be rewarded with a small sum of each resource

banks.name: Derelict ship
banks.description: The hero can battle with water elementals and be rewarded with gold and artifacts

banks.name: Dragon fly hive
banks.description: The hero can fight dragon flies and serpent flies and be rewarded with with a group of wyverns

banks.name: Dragon Utopia
banks.description: The hero can fight dragons and be rewarded with gold and artifacts

banks.name: Dwarven treasury
banks.description: The hero can battle with dwarves and be rewarded with gold and crystals

banks.name: Imp cache
banks.description: The hero can battle with imps and be rewarded with gold and mercury

banks.name: Griffin conservatory
banks.description: The hero can fight griffinss and be rewarded with with a group of angels

banks.name: Medusa stores
banks.description: The hero can battle with medusas and be rewarded with gold and sulfur

banks.name: Naga bank
banks.description: The hero can battle with nagas and be rewarded with gold and gems

banks.name: Pyramid
banks.description: The hero can fight gold golems and diamond golems and be rewarded with a random fifth-level spell

banks.name: Shipwreck
banks.description: The hero can battle with wights and be rewarded with gold and artifacts
